item.description: Autumn in New England is beautiful and Connecticut is known for its breath taking beauty as the leaves turn color welcoming in fall and saying goodbye to the lazy days of summer - there is know better place to see the rich color of Autumn then Gouveia Vineyards - Come let us raise our glasses and salute in Fall by sharing a glass or two of wine and listening to Mike Proscino  as he plays is piano singing such favorites as "Sweet Caroline " and "Margaritaville" our theme will be Portugal so bring your favorite portuguese dish to share  - who ever brings the tastiest appetizer will win a bottle of wine :-)

group.name: New Haven Wine and Dining Meetup Group,

item.name: A Beautiful Autumn Day At Gouveia Vineyards
